pageContent: Objectives: To document the effects of pelvic radiotherapy on bowel, bladder, and sexual function, as reported by the patient.

metaData.source:
Prevalence and Predictors of Climacturia and Associated Patient/Partner Bother in Patients With History of Definitive Therapy for Prostate Cancer
